item.title: MRK
item.description: score:174 Chances: Merck & Co., Inc. is engaged in the provision of health solutions through its prescription medicines, vaccines, biologic therapies, animal health, and consumer care productsThe company operates in Pharmaceutical, Animal Health, and Other segmentsIt has entered into a clinical trial collaboration agreement with LAVA Therapeutics NV for evaluation of its anti-PD-1 therapy Keytruda Risks: The company’s stock price might be vulnerable to the large stake held by institutionsUncertainty around the future of stock markets remains highThe Senate HELP committee is seeking testimony from the company Score:174 chances characters count - risks characters count = 174
